summary: Allows the crafting of Shivs using embalming tools that are laying around the ruins of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][U][COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=7]Craftable Shivs[/CENTER][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[CENTER][COLOR=#C00000]______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][U][COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=5]Purpose[/CENTER][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[CENTER]After numerous playthroughs of Skyrim, I noticed all the useless embalming tools in the Nordic Ruins. This mods aims to change that uselessness. Each Shiv is made from the various metals [Iron, Steel, Dwarven, and so on...][/CENTER] 

[CENTER][COLOR=#C00000]______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[CENTER][U][COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=5]Weapon Info[/CENTER][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[CENTER]Damage is based on the dagger of each type with a modified critical damage. An Iron Dagger has a damage rating of 4 and critical damage of 2. Shivs have a critical damage twice the base damage plus the dagger\'s critical damage. So an Iron Shiv would do 4 base damage and 10 critical damage not including any sneak attack bonuses. Damage listed in the images are modified due to Skyre being installed.[/CENTER] 

*SkyRe users remember to run the ReProccer after installing. Check your load order to verify Shiv.esp and Shiv - Dragonborn.esp are above ReProccer.esp*

[CENTER][COLOR=#C00000]______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[CENTER][U][COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=5]Sneak Skill Level For Crafting[/CENTER][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[CENTER]Iron = 10
Steel = 20
Silver = 25
Dwarven = 30
Elven = 40
Orchish = 50
Nordic = 60
Glass = 70
Stalhrim = 80
Ebony = 80
Deadric = 90
Dragonbone = 100[/CENTER]
author: Corpsehatch
